00013         abstract class AbstractComment extends ActiveRecord implements Dateable
00014         {
00015                 protected function init($values)
00016                 {
00017                         if (isset($values['URL']) &&
00018                                 !empty($values['URL']) &&
00019                                 strpos($values['URL'], 'http://') !== 0)
00020                         {
00021                                 $this->URL = 'http://' . $values['URL'];
00022                         }
00023                 }
00024                 
00029                 public function relative_url()
00030                 {
00031                         return "#comment-{$this->id}";
00032                 }
00033                 
00038                 public function comment_class()
00039                 {
00040                         static $row = 0;
00041                         if (!$this->approved)
00042                         {
00043                                 return "comment-pending";
00044                         }
00045                         $row = 1 - $row;
00046                         return $row ? "comment-even" : "comment-odd";
00047                 }
00048                 
00054                 public function pretty_text()
00055                 {
00056                         // Should handle some markup syntax, markdown, textile, URLs etc.
00057                         return nl2br($this->text);
00058                 }
00059                 
00064                 public function human_readable_date()
00065                 {
00066                         return strftime("%A %e %B %Y %H:%M:%S", strtotime($this->created_at));
00067                 }
00068                 
00073                 public function rfc2822_date()
00074                 {
00075                         return date('r', strtotime($this->created_at));
00076                 }
00077                 
00082                 public function iso8601_date()
00083                 {
00084                         return date('c', strtotime($this->created_at));
00085                 }
00086                 
00091                 public static function sort_comments($a, $b)
00092                 {
00093                         return (strtotime($a->created_at) < strtotime($b->created_at)) ? -1 : 1;
00094                 }
00095         }
